entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 3:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 44 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
